title: Just a question about getting riot points
body: Cant you use like gift cards that are not league of legends ones. Like a gamestop gift card?

replies.body:
Through [**Openbucks**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks-), you can use gift card from Subway, CVS Pharmacy, Dollar General, and Burger King to purchase RP for League. I'm not entirely sure, but you *may* be able to use a Gamestop Gift Card at Gamestop to purchase a prepaid RP card, but you'll have to call your local store for more details.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Unless they changed it, a couple weeks ago I converted a Gamestop Gift Card into a RP card.
